text:
Aarón Padilla Gutiérrez (July 10, 1942 – June 14, 2020) was a Mexican football striker. He played for the Mexico national team between 1965 and 1970. He was part of the Mexico squad for the 1966 and 1970 World Cups.
At club level, Padilla played for Pumas, Atlante, and Veracruz. He was born in Mexico City.
Padilla Gutiérrez died of COVID-19 in Guadalajara, Mexico on June 14, 2020 at the age of
